Had been eating tapas for every meal for a few days when my husband and I, roaming the streets at night, spotted the neon red "Ramen" sign floating down an alleyway!  We are diehard but critical ramen fans and vowed to eat there the next evening.  When we arrived, we were warmly greeted by the owner, almost as if we were old friends.  The waitress was also very sweet.  I forget which meat ramen my husband ordered but he thought it was fantastic.  More difficult to make tasty, I thought the vegetarian miso ramen was a huge success!  The local microbrews we had on the side were also great.  Would eat here again if in Barcelona and craving ramen :)
